body:
We want to introduce a patch from here for `cvs`:
https://gitweb.gentoo.org/repo/gentoo.git/tree/dev-vcs/cvs/files/cvs-1.12.13.1-fix-gnulib-SEGV-vasnprintf.patch

But when we using `patch()` function with above url, we can get a html file only.
So, what should I do to get the real patch file url?

Thanks for your kindly guidance.
title: How to get a patch from website?
